Articles.Content:
Hay there!

I was board and I created this wallpaper. It is meant to make the computer appear like it has come from the Kerbal Space Program.

It's not perfect but what do you expect from about 5 minutes of spare time?

-PCGeek

www.youtube.com/geekvsgames
If my current wallpaper was not the beautiful orbital sunrise that is also used as my flag below (sig), I would totally use this.
...I kinda want to go to a computer store and change all the backgrounds to this.

...I kinda want to go to a computer store and change all the backgrounds to this.

For Jeb! XD
'DO NOT REMOVE'... Like, don't steal the computer?
Yeah. You know that kerbals want the best of the best xD
Yep. They all want the mission control pc's
if you make a new one you should make it on a post it note, like what the kerbals use, then it looks like it was stuck on the screen, but gj

If my current wallpaper was not the beautiful orbital sunrise that is also used as my flag below (sig), I would totally use this.

Windows 8 (and probably earlier) lets you pick a folder and it rotates pictures from that. Mine is set to about 3 minutes. It keeps the wife and I from bickering over the wallpaper
The text should be made smaller. It's a bit out-of-place-looking right now.

'DO NOT REMOVE'... Like, don't steal the computer?

It that a TRS-80 model 4 in your profile pic?
